name: Commentaire Instagram automatisé sur des profils sélectionnés avec GPT-4o et Phantombuster
description:
## À qui cela s'adresse  
Influenceurs et équipes de médias sociaux qui souhaitent *commenter automatiquement les publications de profils Instagram sélectionnés*—augmentant l'engagement tout en respectant les limites de la plateforme.  

## Comment cela fonctionne / Ce que cela fait  
1. **Déclencheur de planification** s'exécute toutes les 2 h.  
2. **Extracteur de publications de profil** récupère jusqu'à 20 publications par profil à partir de votre CSV.  
3. **Sélectionner le cookie** fait tourner les cookies de session Instagram.  
4. **Obtenir une publication aléatoire** en sélectionne une.  
5. **Créer un commentaire** (GPT-4o) écrit une réponse de ≤150 caractères dans la langue de votre choix.  
6. Crée `instagram_post_to_comment.csv`, télécharge sur SharePoint.  
7. **Agent d'autocommentaire Phantombuster** le publie.  
8. Enregistré dans `instagram_posts_already_commented.csv` pour éviter les répétitions.  

## Comment configurer  
- Identique à l'auto-aimer, mais ajoutez également `instagram_posts_already_commented.csv` (en-tête `postUrl`).  
- Définissez les profils suivis dans `profiles_instagram.csv`.  
- Configurez l'invite de commentaire et la langue dans **Définir les variables ENV**.  

## Format CSV de profil  
Votre `profiles_instagram.csv` doit contenir un en-tête `profileUrl` et des URL de profil Instagram valides. Exemple :  
```csv
profileUrl
https://www.instagram.com/brand_account/
https://www.instagram.com/influencer123/

workflow.name: Instagram Auto Commenting (Profile Post Extractor) - Creators Hub

parameters.content: ## Launch Autocomment Agent to Post Comment

assignments.name: ENV_COMMENT_PROMPT
assignments.value: Erstelle einen ansprechenden Instagram-Kommentar basierend auf dem gegebenen Post-Inhalt.

parameters.text:
=##################  PROMPT  ##################

**ROLE:**  You are a session-cookie selector.

**CURRENT BERLIN TIME**  
Date & time : {{ $now.setZone('Europe/Berlin').format('DD HH:mm:ss') }}  
Hour (00-23): {{ $now.setZone('Europe/Berlin').format('HH') }}

**SESSION COOKIES (keep order):**  
{{ $json.data }}

**SELECTION LOGIC**

1. Let  
   • N = number of cookies in the list (2 ≤ N ≤ 4).  
   • H = current hour as an integer (0–23).  
   • W = 24 ÷ N  (the width of each time slice in hours, always an integer).

2. Determine the slice index:  
   sliceIndex = floor(H ÷ W)  // 0-based

3. Choose the cookie at position *(sliceIndex + 1)* in the list.  
   • Example when N = 4 (W = 6):  
     00-05 → 1st, 06-11 → 2nd, 12-17 → 3rd, 18-23 → 4th  
   • Example when N = 3 (W = 8):  
     00-07 → 1st, 08-15 → 2nd, 16-23 → 3rd  
   • Example when N = 2 (W = 12):  
     00-11 → 1st, 12-23 → 2nd

**OUTPUT FORMAT**  
Return only the selected session cookie value in a valid JSON-Field called "session_cookie", nothing else.

##############################################

parameters.content: ## Start Workflow and Retrieve Session Cookie
## Get Instagram Posts By Custom Hashtag

### 1) Cookie & Hashtag Selection  
**What it does**  
• Downloads cookie list ➜ **Select Cookie** picks one by hour-slice.  

**Credentials**  
OpenAI + SharePoint OAuth2.

**Tweaks**  
• Add/remove cookies in SharePoint file.

### 2) Scrape Instagram Posts  
**What it does**  
• **Hashtag Agent** fetches 20 posts for the defined Instagram profiles in the CSV file.  
• **Get Posts** forwards raw results downstream.

**Credentials**  
Phantombuster API.

**Tweaks**   
• Adjust scrape depth in the agent UI.

### 3) Comment Generation  
**What it does**  
• **Get Random Post** selects one post + description.  
• **Create Comment** (GPT-4o) returns a ≤150-char reply.

**Credentials**  
OpenAI.

**Tweaks**  
• Edit language or style via **Set ENV Variables** / prompt.

### 4) CSV Upload & Auto-comment  
**What it does**  
• Builds one-row CSV (post URL + comment).  
• Uploads to SharePoint.  
• **Auto-comment Agent** posts the reply.

**Credentials**  
SharePoint OAuth2 + Phantombuster API.

**Tweaks**  
• Rename files/folders in **Upload CSV**.  
• Replace SharePoint with Drive/Dropbox if preferred.

### 5) Deduplication  
**What it does**  
• Downloads `instagram_posts_already_commented.csv`.  
• **Check if in List** skips URLs already commented.  
• On success, appends the new URL and re-uploads the file.

**Credentials**  
SharePoint OAuth2.

**Tweaks**  
• Modify duplicate logic if extra columns are stored.

### 6) Rate Limiting & Scheduling  
**What it does**  
• 2-hour cron + **Wait** nodes keep totals near 80 comments/day
  (8 runs × 10 posts).

**Credentials**  
None

**Tweaks**  
• Edit cron rule or wait durations.  
• Increase comments/day by raising limits and frequency.

user.name: plemeo
user.bio: Hi, I'm Gerhard from Plemeo. At plemeo.ai, we focus on AI-driven automation and workflow optimization. Our deep expertise with n8n enables us to streamline processes and boost efficiency in software development. This allows us to deliver real, measurable improvements. Curious how plemeo.ai and n8n can benefit your business? Reach out at info@plemeo.de or visit plemeo.ai.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
